name: Up To Gnome Good
description:
Play as Gnomeo, an underpaid worker for the Hot Trans Witch, as he tries to meet her demands.

**Known bugs: sometimes faucet doesn't turn on, die and try again to hopefully fix**

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys, and E to interact

Info:

Made for Open Alpha {Open} Game Jam Fall 2022, with the theme Mini
